div.p: The official URL for this implementation guide is:
Implementation Guide for Practitioner Qualifications and Primary Source Verification.

description.value: Implementation Guide for Practitioner Qualifications and Primary Source Verification.

valueMarkdown.value: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology
Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on the HL7 Extension Pack

description.value: Minimal specialty codes used in examples. Replace/expand with your authoritative list.

name.value: City Medical Center GME — Verification API

description.value: Subset of U.S. controlled substance schedules commonly applicable to prescribers. Schedule I excluded.
DEA registrant categories relevant to care delivery and dispensing.
Carries a reference to the VerificationResult that justifies this Flag.
Optional element path (e.g., qualification[license][0]) for UI deep-linking.

name.value: Practitioner with License, Sanction, Flag, Evidence
Provenance for VR — Alex Smith License

description.value: Defines a concrete verification activity to be performed by a worker/system.
System-level audit of verification operations.
Endpoints for boards/registries/verifiers.
Raw binary artifact (hashable).
Stores document artifacts (PDF, CSV, screenshots) used as evidence.
Aggregates verification coverage or SLA metrics.
Reports metrics for verification coverage/SLA.
Represents employers, boards (validators), certifying bodies, accreditors.
Privileges and affiliations between organizations and practitioners.
Defines policy (frequency, method, failure action) for verification types.

name.value: PSV Practitioner with Qualification Slices (Common Pattern + Rules)

description.value: Practitioner profile with typed qualification slices and shared invariants for credentialing.
PractitionerRole for roles/specialties linked to organizations.
Audits VerificationResult with evidence entities (CSV snapshot, API receipt, PDF).
Requests execution of a verification (e.g., LEIE monthly, license quarterly).
Standard verification evidence linking validators to verified targets.

name.value: PSVPractitioner — Board certification(s) with VR, Provenance, Evidence
PSVPractitioner — DEA registration(s) with VR, Provenance, Evidence
PSVPractitioner — Education (degree) with VR, Provenance, Evidence
PSVPractitioner — State CSR with VR, Provenance, Evidence
PSVPractitioner — Training (residency & fellowship) with VR, Provenance, Evidence

description.value: Status of a credential/qualification entry (e.g., active, expired, suspended).
Completion state for a training program.
Types of postgraduate clinical training programs.

name.value: VR — License Suspension from State Board

description.value: Allowed specialties used for training/board examples.
Allowed DEA schedules for clinician prescribing context.
Allowed DEA registrant categories for practitioner credentialing.
Allowed values for training completion status.
Allowed training types for practitioner qualifications.
